detail_desc: Top in soft, fine-knit cotton with a V-neck front and back and a narrow cut at the top.
Knee-length dress in a crêpe weave with a V-neck, buttons down the front and short sleeves with a drawstring. Seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt. Unlined.
T-shirt in soft jersey with an interactive motif on the front and narrow ribbing around the neckline.
Jacket in printed sweatshirt fabric with a lined hood, zip down the front and overlocked seams. Side pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Brushed inside.

Jacket in washed cotton denim with slightly worn details. Collar, buttons down the front and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Flap chest pockets with a button, side pockets and an adjustable tab at the sides of the hem. Soft faux shearling lining.
Fleece-lined jersey hat with a small fabric appliqué on the hem.
Top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Puff pants in soft organic cotton jersey.
Twill cap with an appliqué on the front and an adjustable plastic fastener at the back.
Wide, long-sleeved jumper in a soft rib knit containing glittery threads with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Elastic scrunchies in soft velour.

Short dress in woven fabric with a sheen in a narrow cut at the top with narrow shoulder straps and a button at the back of the neck. Opening at the front with inset lace, open back with lace panels, a gathered seam at the waist and bell-shaped skirt with concealed zip at the back. Lined.
Classic T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a print motif and a round, ribbed neckline.
Sleeveless jumpsuit in airy, jacquard-weave Tencel™ lyocell with adjustable spaghetti shoulder straps, a concealed zip at the back and straight legs. Satin-lined bodice.
Crushed velvet jacket with a stand-up collar and zip down the front. Long raglan sleeves with elasticated cuffs, and a drawstring at the hem.
Long-sleeved jumper in soft, fine-knit merino wool with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Hat in felted fabric with a grosgrain band. Width of brim 6 cm.

Joggers in sweatshirt fabric with contrasting colour stripes down the sides, an elasticated drawstring waist and slightly lower crotch. Side pockets, one back pocket and tapered legs with ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.
Lightly padded, diamond-quilted gilet with a ribbed collar, zip down the front, side pockets and an inner pocket with a hook and loop fastening. Contrasting colour lining.
Short, sleeveless dress in lightweight Tencel™ lyocell denim with a V-neck, narrow shoulder straps and buttons down the front. Unlined.
Short dress in cotton jersey with ribbing around the neckline and short cap sleeves. Unlined.
Leotard in glossy jersey with double, crossed straps at the back, long sleeves and a lined gusset.
Headband in a soft knit containing some wool with a draped detail at the front. Width 10 cm.
Waistcoat in twill made from a viscose blend with buttons down the front and fake front pockets. Lined.
T-shirts in soft organic cotton jersey with a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Short yoga top in soft, fast-drying functional fabric with long sleeves and a tie detail at the front of the hem.

Sports bra in fast-drying functional fabric with jacquard-patterned details. Wide shoulder straps, a low cut at the back and a wide, ribbed hem. Light support. The bra is designed with the minimum number of seams for a more comfortable fit and increased mobility.

Biker jacket in imitation suede with a collar, decorative buttons on the lapels and a diagonal zip down the front. Long sleeves with a zip at the cuffs, a zipped chest pocket, a zipped side pocket and a small, decorative flap with a press-stud. Tab with a press-stud at the sides. Lined.

Short, wide dress in soft sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with ribbing around the neckline and long, slightly wider sleeves with ribbed cuffs. Gathered seam at the hips for added volume at the hem. Soft brushed inside.
Shorts in airy jersey with an elasticated waist, side pockets and wide legs.
A-line skirt in a cotton weave with a concealed zip in one side and a detachable, matching belt with a metal buckle.
Short dress in jersey with a V-neck and elastic spaghetti shoulder straps that cross at the back. Double layer at the top.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a print motif on the front and short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups.
Joggers in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, low crotch, visible seams and tapered legs with ribbed hems.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a high, V-shaped waist, flounces at the top and high cut at the back.
Tube scarf knitted in soft cotton with ribbed trims and a small appliqué at the bottom.
Blouse in a soft viscose weave with embroidery at the top, a collar and buttons down the front. 3/4-length sleeves with narrow elastication, a flounce and decorative ties at the cuffs.
Shorts in washed stretch denim with an adjustable elasticated waist and zip fly and press-stud. Fake front pockets, real back pockets and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Baby Exclusive. All-in-one suit in cotton slub jersey in a loose fit with buttons down the front.

5-pocket, ankle-length jeans in washed, stretch denim with worn details. High waist, zip fly and button and skinny legs. Embrace – denim with a smart stretch function that moulds to the body for a comfortable, flattering silhouette.
Set with a vest top and pair of shorts in soft, organic cotton jersey. Shorts with an elasticated waist.
Flared, calf-length skirt in tulle with covered elastication at the waist and a seam creating a flounce at the hem for added width and volume. Jersey lining.

Fully lined cargo trousers in soft, washed cotton twill with an adjustable, elasticated waist and zip fly and button. Flap front and leg pockets with a hook and loop fastening, fake back pockets with a decorative sewn-on flap, and shaped, tapered legs. Jersey lining.
Double-layered hat in a soft rib knit with a sewn-in turn-up at the hem with a small fabric appliqué on the front.
Short-sleeved dress in a rib knit.

Shirt in an airy weave made from a cotton blend with a turn-down collar and classic front. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, a yoke at the back and a rounded hem. Slim fit with narrow shoulders and a tapered waist for a fitted silhouette.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a low waist, narrow sides and a high cut at the back.
KELZUKI x H&M. Hat in soft cotton jersey with a flock print on the front. Fleece lining.
Straight-cut top in soft cotton jersey with a print motif, dropped shoulders and long sleeves.

5-pocket, ankle-length jeans in washed, stretch denim with a fake fly and gently tapered legs. Wide jersey panel at the waist for best fit over the tummy. Some of the cotton content of the jeans is recycled.

Sleeveless dress in a cotton weave with a collar, button placket, chest pocket with a button, and a small frill trim around the armholes. Detachable, braided belt, pockets in the side seams and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.

Knee-length shorts in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with a soft brushed inside. Covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist, zipped side pockets and a fake welt back pocket. Legs with text-print side panels and decorative seams.
Long-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey with a lace yoke and gently rounded hem.
Short dress in soft jersey with a V-neck, narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, seam at the waist and flared skirt.
Fully lined bikini top with a knot at the front and no fastening.

prod_name: Jade HW Skinny Belt Denim TRS
detail_desc: High-waisted jeans in stretch denim with a zip fly and button and detachable belt with a large, covered buckle. Fake front pockets, real back pockets and skinny legs.
Straight-style, double-breasted coat in a wool blend with a brushed finish. Notch lapels, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and large patch front pockets. Recycled polyester lining.

Straight-cut, calf-length dress in woven fabric with a grandad collar and covered buttons at the top. Detachable tie belt at the waist and long, slightly wider sleeves with covered buttons at the narrow cuffs. Unlined.
Pyjamas in soft, printed cotton jersey. Long-sleeved top with ribbing around the neckline and cuffs. Bottoms with an elasticated waist and ribbed hems.
Collarless satin blouse with concealed buttons down the front, long sleeves with wide, buttoned cuffs and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Slim-fit jeans in washed stretch denim with hard-worn details and sequins. Adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and press-stud, fake front pockets, real back pockets and narrow hems.
Ankle-length cigarette trousers in a stretch weave with a regular waist, hook-and-eye fastening and zip fly. Side pockets, fake welt back pockets and tapered legs.
Short dress in a viscose weave with a V-neck and ties at the front, narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and elasticated seam at the waist. Unlined.
Shoes in soft imitation suede with tassels at the front, elastic gores in the sides and a loop at the back. Velour linings and insoles and fluted soles.
Fine-knit, knee-high football socks in fast-drying functional fabric with elastication at the top, ankle and foot for best fit. Double layer underneath for extra cushioning.
Leggings in soft organic cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.

Long, warm-lined jacket in washed denim with a collar, buttons down the front, flap chest pockets with a button and side pockets. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and an adjustable tab and button at the sides of the hem. Pile lining.
Ankle-length trousers in an airy linen blend with a regular, elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and straight, wide legs.
Long, 5-pocket shorts in washed, superstretch denim with worn details with patches on the inside. Adjustable, elasticated waist and a zip fly and button.
Socks in a soft fine-knit with elasticated tops.
Fully lined swimsuit with a sculpting effect that holds in and shapes the tummy and bum. Cups with removable inserts, wide, adjustable shoulder straps and decorative gathers in the sides.
Fitted vest top in ribbed jersey crêpe with lace at the top and front.
Short dungaree shorts in washed stretch denim with a chest pocket and adjustable straps. Buttons at the sides, a fake fly, fake front pockets, real back pockets and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
5-pocket, ankle-length jeans in washed stretch denim with hard-worn details, a high waist and gently tapered legs with raw-edge hems.
Pyjamas with strappy top and pair of shorts in soft satin. Top with a lace-trimmed V-neck and narrow, adjustable shoulder straps. Shorts with a glittery elastic waistband.
Straight-cut T-shirt in airy slub jersey with a lace detail at the top.
Scarf in a soft loose weave with fringes on the short sides. Size 80x200 cm.
Thin metal chain necklaces with various decorations, one in fabric with plastic beads. Adjustable length from 30-37 cm to 45-53 cm.
Knee-length dress in sturdy jersey with short sleeves, a seam at the waist and bell-shaped skirt. Unlined.

Shirt in soft, checked cotton flannel with a turn-down collar, classic front and yoke at the back. Open chest pocket, long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
